definition: chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain

sentences.english: These experimental formulae can be used to predict the boiling points of the hydrocarbons.
sentences.chinese: 應用這些經驗公式可以預測不飽和鏈烴的沸點。

sentences.english: The process of changing an open-chain hydrocarbon structure to a closed ring, e. g. , hexane to benzene.
sentences.chinese: 使開鏈烴結構變成閉環烴的過程，例如使己烷變成苯。
